column5: Hi,  I am heading to Niagara Falls this Saturday to take the wife shopping at Lundy's Lane . I will a have approx 5-6 hours of time to go fishing. Would like to get any suggestions where to go shore fishing around the area. I can target any species from salmon, trout, bass, carp, etc.  Thanks all for your help.
Do the Whirlpool if you are in decent physical condition, the stairs are good, but it is a tough climb. It is worth it!! Salmon are in, musky, bass, carp..everything.

Good shore fishing areas as mentioned, the 'Whirlpool', Queeston boat launch area. If you drive along the Niagara Parkway upstream to Fort Erie you will find various shore spots, especially in Fort Erie.
